title: does riot staff members have brain cancer?
body:
so even now one game i afk because the fking sup choose a rengar i fking have to wait in low q for 5 min? dickhead riot staff members why u never punish those trolls in normals, just every game i have to be teamed with bull shits and i cannot afk and just have to go on play with them ?

fine from now on i will troll every game i fking play so riot will be happy

fk the mom dead riot staff members

I had considered writing it as a haiku actually, but decided to keep it simple for OP, he wouldn't have understood anyway.
We're gonna be having roast "The Raging Blade" tonight for dinner lmao

I've seen a rengar sup, he smashed it. Then did akali sup the next game, and carried xD

Norms is for stuffing around dude. If you want a game full of meta picks, play ranked. Because you will find more meta picks in ranked than norms. It really is that simple.

First there is a thing called reporting

and second they punish those who leave games, a system called "leave buster" was implemented as a result of those who leave games.

I know how you feel but I guess  more report on that person will prompt him to get like suspended or something but please don't blame Riot with this kind response. As implementing a system that bans trolls is difficult to scan through the entire server analysing specific players and determine whether they are trolls or not would take a lot of time investing into while they looking  into other important areas such as a firewall that protects our information and such. 

Things you may think are simple are more complicated for the Riot staff to implement some sort of system to deal with this.

*Do

Does would be if you were referring to a single Rioter. 

i.e. Does a Riot member have brain cancer?

You definitely have some sort of neurological issue though, OP.

OP mad.
English bad.
So so sad.
{{item:3070}}
does you have bad grammar

What I'd like to know is why your first reaction to someone picking Rengar support was to afk in the game, ruining the experience for 9 people, instead of pressing that little "X" at the top right of your client and queue dodging. I'm not suggesting you go and queue dodge every game you don't like the comp, since that's just as unreasonable as afking enough times to be leaverbustered, but surely you can use your best judgement to get out of the **most extreme** cases.
Your whole post proves that riot is punishing the right people

> [{quoted}](name=RNG Worlds S6,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=buK5AYV1,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-09-10T00:52:31.941+0000)
>
> Your whole post proves that riot is punishing the right people

The truth has been spoken

It's normals for a reason.

No one loses anything in a normals gamemode. I don't mind if people go weird champions on different roles, because they aren't doing anything bad.

It's in Ranked mode that people like this should be punished.

Also, don't start talking about other people's mothers.
They do get punished. I know people who've been perma banned. It's not Riot, it's the players. The only thing they can do is try and implement a machine ID ban so people don't just change their IP.

so afk 1 game one day to avoid play a shit team after pp instant lock and feed is bad?

or so i wish everygame  u get bull shit team mates feed to 5/ 15 or some thing like that  so u will play with these non-surrender %%%%s all the time

I'm gonna be honest, it's pretty easy to game the system if you don't jump often. My friends know me for rage quitting lmao. You have to time it with intervals. And not abuse Riot because that's going to get you less than nowhere.

BRO. Don't leave cause you have a bad team, who does that?


JEEZ




and people don't surrender cus u get less ip if u do

so when u fk team  me with bull shit people every day, why not u staff members punish them ? so i can play rengar sup, kate top instnat lock and fking around with out being punished? or riot staff memebers mom dead to discriminate me? good on them, for each game they punish me now i will ruin one game for others, is that good enough? fking  i will play rengar sup fking all the games ur mom dead dickheads
